means: 宽幅印刷品（如报纸、广告等）

sentence.Network_en: The newspaper had commenced as a duplicated broadsheet.
sentence.Network_cn: 这家报纸最初为双面版.

sentence.Network_en: The country already has an English language paper: the staid official broadsheet the China Daily.
sentence.Network_cn: 中国已经有了一份英文报纸 -- 风格稳健的官方报纸《中国日报》.

sentence.Network_en: Sexto: A size of paper obtation by sub - dividing a broadsheet into six parts.
sentence.Network_cn: 六开: 把原张纸分为六等份大小的尺寸.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 所谓大报（Broadsheet），一般版面尺寸较大，所登载的新闻较为严肃，以《泰晤士报》、《独立报》、《每日电讯报》、《卫报》 …
...媒体信任度上升幅度最大。对开大报（broadsheet）的信任度提高了47个百分点，信任度上升幅度最小的是小报（tabloid），提高 …
broadness 广阔broadsheet 大幅纸张broadside 舷侧
《学生报》旧时不予钉装，印刷成报纸一样的大开型报章（broadsheet），当时报头所示的著作名称是“中大学生”。现时每月定期出版 …

list.abs: It can print broadsheet and tabs , semi - commercial work in a range of formats ., 它可以印刷报纸和标签 , 半商业工作的一系列格式.

a recent study by the communications industry watchdog Ofcom in Britain found that only 45 percent of UK adults trust broadsheet newspaper content . only 19 percent trust tabloid newspapers ;英国传播行业监察机构Ofcom最近开展的一次调查显示，只有45%的英国成年人相信大报上的内容，相信小报的则只有19%。
It can print broadsheet and tabs , semi - commercial work in a range of formats ., 它可以印刷报纸和标签 , 半商业工作的一系列格式.
the country already has an English language paper : the staid official broadsheet the China Daily .中国已经有了一份英文报纸--风格稳健的官方报纸《中国日报》。

entry.tran: 大幅报纸（一般认为是内容较严肃的报纸）
entry.def: A broadsheet is a newspaper that is printed on large sheets of paper. Broadsheets are generally considered to be more serious than other newspapers.

means.word_mean: 1. an advertisement (usually printed on a page or in a leaflet) intended for wide distribution;

sentences.sentence: "he mailed the circular to all subscribers"

auth_sentence.content: That is a sheer tabloid instinct, in a broadsheet world.

auth_sentence.content: Whereas a bishop, an actress and a broadsheet columnist could well be.
auth_sentence.res_content: Whereas a bishop, an actress and a broadsheet columnist could well be.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Whereas a bishop, an actress and a broadsheet columnist could well be.

auth_sentence.content: The only "broadsheet" I can think of which has redesigned is the Guardian, which was a bit of a failure in all counts really.
